title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Pre-Socialization MOOC-Based Instruction for Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can describe a three-step process for setting goals in an online mathematics learning environment.
Learners can propose at least two strategies for forming a learning community through interaction with peers and instructors.
Learners can create and implement a weekly planning template for time management and balancing study-life integration.
Learners can share mathematical problem-solving processes in a structured manner within online discussion forums.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
